sentences.en: Cao Cao from then onwards, let down his guard on Liu Bei.
sentences.cn: 曹操见状,大笑不止,认为刘备连打雷都害怕,成不了大事, 对刘备放松了警觉.

sentences.en: From 1 8 2 0 onwards gold was mainly appreciated.
sentences.cn: 一八二零年以来,黄金价格多半在上涨.

sentences.en: From 1820 onwards gold was mainly appreciated.
sentences.cn: 1820年以来,黄金价格多半在上涨.

sentences.en: From 1999 onwards the city began to take on a new look.
sentences.cn: 从1990年起,这个城市开始出现了新面貌.

sentences.en: From now onwards my teacher will be stricter.
sentences.cn: 从此我的老师会更加严格.

sentences.en: From that time onwards they began to pass through the forest.
sentences.cn: 从那时起他们就开始穿越森林.

sentences.en: He measured the distance to the nearest Antarctic coast, and onwards to the South Pole.
sentences.cn: 他测量了到南极洲海岸最近的距离，以及从海岸再到南极的距离。

sentences.en: He walked onwards to the head of the lake.
sentences.cn: 他一直向前，走到湖泊源头。

sentences.en: I can see things just going onwards and upwards for us now.
sentences.cn: 我认为从现在起我们的境况只会越来越好。

sentences.en: I shall be at home from 8 o'clock onwards.
sentences.cn: 八点钟以后我就在家里.

sentences.en: Pen stopped, hesitated - nodded his head fiercely, and pointed onwards.
sentences.cn: 潘站住了, 有些迟疑不决,接着又拼命点头, 指指前面.

sentences.en: The crowd began to move onwards.
The medical professional bodies reply that development from fertilisation onwards is a continuum.
sentences.cn: 专业医疗机构答复说受精以后的发育是连续的。

sentences.en: The most important thing now is to move onwards.
sentences.cn: 现在至关重要的是要继续向前推进。

sentences.en: They lived there from the 1980s onwards.
sentences.cn: 他们从1980年代起一直住在那里。

sentences.en: They travelled onwards , not stopping during the day or at night.
